title: Mila Kunis says Ashton Kutcher doesn't want her on Real Housewives
text:
Ashton and Mila have been married since 2015 (Picture: Getty Images)

Mila Kunis is a major Real Housewives of Beverly Hills stan but her hubby Ashton Kutcher is less than impressed by the idea of the pair appearing on the reality TV show.

In an interview on comedian Andrea Savage’s Grown-Up Woman podcast, the 36-year-old revealed she once asked what Ashton would think if she joined the franchise, and he was apparently not enthusiastic about the prospect.

‘I did ask my husband once, I was like, “listen. Later, in like 20 years, 30 years, what do you think of me going on Real Housewives of Beverly Hills? I’m like, just for like, a year”. He was like… “I would kill you”‘.

A very normal, chill response.

Former That 70’s Show stars Ashton and Mila tied the knot in 2015 and share two children – a five-year-old daughter Wyatt Isabelle and a two-year-old son Dimitri Portwood.

The family were spotted running across the street as they headed to meet Mila’s father Mark for breakfast in Beverly Hills following Demi Moore’s claims that her ex-husband Ashton cheated on her.

The family are seen sticking close as they cross the street (Picture: Backgrid)

Speaking out after the claims, Ashton simply tweeted: ‘I was about to push the button on a really snarky tweet. Then I saw my son, daughter, and wife and I deleted it.’

It hasn’t been the easiest time for the couple with the explosive revelations from Ashton’s former partner putting them under pressure.

But it seems the pair, who recently enjoyed a ‘magical’ weekend together at Disneyland, have been shrugging off Demi’s claims that Ashton cheated on her after she opened up in her new book.

The happiest place on Earth (Picture: Instagram)

Later on the pod, Mila played a round of Make Love, Marry, Murder with the RHOBH cast, and got candid about her preferences.

Out of the husbands, Mila said she would choose to murder Paul Kemsley, marry Mauricio Umansky, and make love to Harry Hamlin but she made it clear she’s sure Paul and wife Dorit Kemsley are a ‘lovely couple’.
description: Mila Kunis is a major Real Housewives of Beverly Hills stan but her hubby Ashton Kutcher is less than impressed by the idea of the pair appearing on the reality TV show.
